chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (m : fmap) (z : dart) (i : nat), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> let p := Iter_upb m z in {j : nat | Iter (f m) i z = Iter (f m) j z /\ (j < p)%nat}

Premises:
Inductive fmap : Set := V : fmap | I : fmap -> dart -> tag -> point -> fmap | L : fmap -> dim -> dart -> dart -> fmap
inv_hmap = fix inv_hmap (m : fmap) : Prop := match m with | V => True | I m0 x _ _ => inv_hmap m0 /\ prec_I m0 x | L m0 k0 x y => inv_hmap m0 /\ prec_L m0 k0 x y end : fmap -> Prop
Iter = fix Iter (g : dart -> dart) (n : nat) (z : dart) {struct n} : dart := match n with | 0%nat => z | S n0 => g (Iter g n0 z) end : (dart -> dart) -> nat -> dart -> dart Argument scopes are [function_scope nat_scope _]
exd = fix exd (m : fmap) (x : dart) {struct m} : Prop := match m with | V => False | I m0 x0 _ _ => x0 = x \/ exd m0 x | L m0 _ _ _ => exd m0 x end : fmap -> dart -> Prop
f = M.f : fmap -> dart -> dart
Iter_upb = fun (m : fmap) (z : dart) => (ndN m - card (Iter_rem m z))%nat : fmap -> dart -> nat
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat For S: Argument scope is [nat_scope]
dart = nat : Set
Iter_period : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart) (i n : nat), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> let p := Iter_upb m z in Iter (f m) (i + n * p) z = Iter (f m) i z
ex_i_upb : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> let nr := Iter_upb m z in {i : nat | (i < nr)%nat /\ Iter (f m) i z = Iter (f m) nr z}
Iter_plus_mult : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart) (n p i : nat), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> Iter (f m) p z = z -> Iter (f m) (i + n * p) z = Iter (f m) i z
Iter_f_f_1 : forall (m : fmap) (i j : nat) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> (j <= i)%nat -> Iter (f_1 m) j (Iter (f m) i z) = Iter (f m) (i - j) z
Iter_plus : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart) (p i : nat), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> Iter (f m) (p + i) z = Iter (f m) i z -> Iter (f m) p z = z
Iter_plus_inv : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart) (p i : nat), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> Iter (f m) p z = z -> Iter (f m) (p + i) z = Iter (f m) i z
ex_i : forall (m : fmap) (z t : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> exd m t -> let sr := Iter_rem m z in let nr := Iter_upb m z in ~ exds sr t -> {i : nat | (i < nr)%nat /\ Iter (f m) i z = t}
Iter_mult : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart) (n p : nat), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> Iter (f m) p z = z -> Iter (f m) (n * p) z = z
exds_Iter_f_i : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart) (i : nat), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> let s := Iter_orb m z in let n := Iter_upb m z in (i <= n)%nat -> exds s (Iter (f m) i z)
Iter_upb_period : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> let nr := Iter_upb m z in Iter (f m) nr z = z
diff_int = fun (m : fmap) (z : dart) (a b : nat) => forall i j : nat, (a <= i)%nat /\ (i < j <= b)%nat -> Iter (f m) i z <> Iter (f m) j z : fmap -> dart -> nat -> nat -> Prop Argument scopes are [_ _ nat_scope nat_scope]
Iter_f_Si : forall (m : fmap) (i : nat) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> Iter (f m) (S i) z = Iter (f m) i (f m z)
ex_i_aux : forall (m : fmap) (z t : dart) (s : set), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> exds s t -> (card s <= ndN m)%nat -> let sr := Iter_rem_aux m z s in let nr := Iter_upb_aux m z s in ~ exds sr t -> {i : nat | (i < nr)%nat /\ Iter (f m) i z = t}
not_exds_Iter_f_i : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart) (i : nat), let sr := Iter_rem m z in let n := Iter_upb m z in (i <= n)%nat -> ~ exds sr (Iter (f m) i z)
LP7 : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart) (s : set), inv_hmap m -> (card s <= ndN m)%nat -> let n0 := (ndN m - card s)%nat in let nr := Iter_upb_aux m z s in exds s (Iter (f m) n0 z) -> forall j : nat, (n0 < j <= nr - 1)%nat -> Iter (f m) n0 z <> Iter (f m) j z
Iter_f_f_1_i : forall (m : fmap) (i : nat) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> Iter (f_1 m) i (Iter (f m) i z) = z
Iter_comp : forall (m : fmap) (i j : nat) (z : dart), Iter (f m) (i + j) z = Iter (f m) i (Iter (f m) j z)
f_1_Iter_f : forall (m : fmap) (i : nat) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> f_1 m (Iter (f m) (S i) z) = Iter (f m) i z
P7 = fun (m : fmap) (z : dart) (s : set) => inv_hmap m -> (card s <= ndN m)%nat -> let n0 := (ndN m - card s)%nat in let nr := Iter_upb_aux m z s in exds s (Iter (f m) n0 z) -> forall j : nat, (n0 < j <= nr - 1)%nat -> Iter (f m) n0 z <> Iter (f m) j z : fmap -> dart -> set -> Prop
P4 = fun (m : fmap) (z t : dart) (s : set) => inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> exds s t -> (card s <= ndN m)%nat -> let sr := Iter_rem_aux m z s in let nr := Iter_upb_aux m z s in ~ exds sr t -> {i : nat | (i < nr)%nat /\ Iter (f m) i z = t} : fmap -> dart -> dart -> set -> Set
Iter_f_1_Si : forall (m : fmap) (i : nat) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> Iter (f_1 m) (S i) z = Iter (f_1 m) i (f_1 m z)
exd_Iter_orb_upb : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> let n := Iter_upb m z in exds (Iter_orb m z) (Iter (f m) n z)
L3 : forall (m : fmap) (z t : dart) (x : set), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> exds x t -> let sr := Iter_rem_aux m z x in let zn0 := Iter (f m) (ndN m - card x) z in ~ exds sr t -> exds x zn0
L2 : forall (m : fmap) (z t : dart) (x : set), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> exds x t -> let sr := Iter_rem_aux m z x in let zn0 := Iter (f m) (ndN m - card x) z in ~ exds sr t -> exds x zn0 -> ~ exds (Iter_rem_aux m z (Ds x zn0)) t
LR1 : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart) (i : nat) (s : set), let sr := Iter_rem_aux m z s in let n := Iter_upb_aux m z s in (ndN m - card s <= i <= n)%nat -> ~ exds sr (Iter (f m) i z)
PL3 = fun (m : fmap) (z t : dart) (x : set) => inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> exds x t -> let sr := Iter_rem_aux m z x in let zn0 := Iter (f m) (ndN m - card x) z in ~ exds sr t -> exds x zn0 : fmap -> dart -> dart -> set -> Prop
PL2 = fun (m : fmap) (z t : dart) (x : set) => inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> exds x t -> let sr := Iter_rem_aux m z x in let zn0 := Iter (f m) (ndN m - card x) z in ~ exds sr t -> exds x zn0 -> ~ exds (Iter_rem_aux m z (Ds x zn0)) t : fmap -> dart -> dart -> set -> Prop
R1 = fun (m : fmap) (z : dart) (i : nat) (s : set) => let sr := Iter_rem_aux m z s in let n := Iter_upb_aux m z s in (ndN m - card s <= i <= n)%nat -> ~ exds sr (Iter (f m) i z) : fmap -> dart -> nat -> set -> Prop Argument scopes are [_ _ nat_scope _]
exd_Iter_upb : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> exd m (Iter (f m) (Iter_upb m z) z)
diff_int_aux = fun (m : fmap) (z : dart) (a b : nat) (t : dart) => forall i : nat, (a <= i <= b)%nat -> Iter (f m) i z <> t : fmap -> dart -> nat -> nat -> dart -> Prop Argument scopes are [_ _ nat_scope nat_scope _]
not_exds_Iter_rem_upb : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), let n := Iter_upb m z in ~ exds (Iter_rem m z) (Iter (f m) n z)
Iter_rem_aux_equation : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart) (sx : set), Iter_rem_aux m z sx = (let n := (ndN m - card sx)%nat in let zn := Iter (f m) n z in if exds_dec sx zn then Iter_rem_aux m z (Ds sx zn) else sx)
exd_Iter_f : forall (m : fmap) (n : nat) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z < -> exd m (Iter (f m) n z)
LP8 : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart) (s : set), inv_hmap m -> (card s <= ndN m)%nat -> let n0 := (ndN m - card s)%nat in let nr := Iter_upb_aux m z s in exds s (Iter (f m) n0 z) -> diff_int m z n0 (nr - 1)
LP6 : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart) (s : set), inv_hmap m -> (card s <= ndN m)%nat -> let n0 := (ndN m - card s)%nat in let nr := Iter_upb_aux m z s in exds s (Iter (f m) n0 z) -> exds_int m z n0 (nr - 1) s
not_exds_rem_upb : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart) (s : set), let sr := Iter_rem_aux m z s in let n := Iter_upb_aux m z s in ~ exds sr (Iter (f m) n z)
P1 = fun (m : fmap) (z : dart) (s : set) => let sr := Iter_rem_aux m z s in let n := Iter_upb_aux m z s in ~ exds sr (Iter (f m) n z) : fmap -> dart -> set -> Prop
rem_2_steps : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart) (s : set), inv_hmap m -> let sr := Iter_rem_aux m z s in let nr := Iter_upb_aux m z s in (card sr + 2 <= card s)%nat -> exds (Ds s (Iter (f m) (ndN m - card s) z)) (Iter (f m) (ndN m + 1 - card s) z)
upb_pos : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), exd m z -> (0 < Iter_upb m z)%nat
rem_1_step : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart) (s : set), inv_hmap m -> let sr := Iter_rem_aux m z s in let nr := Iter_upb_aux m z s in (card sr + 1 <= card s)%nat < -> exds s (Iter (f m) (ndN m - card s) z)

```Proof.
intros m z i H1 H2 p.
exists (i mod p).
split.
- rewrite <- (Nat.add_0_r i) at 1.
  rewrite <- Nat.mul_1_l at 1.
  rewrite Nat.mod_add; auto.
  rewrite Nat.mod_small; auto.
  apply Nat.lt_succ_diag_r.
- apply Nat.mod_upper_bound; auto.
Qed.```

original: intros m z i H1 H2 p. exists (i mod p). split. - rewrite <- (Nat.add_0_r i) at 1. rewrite <- Nat.mul_1_l at 1. rewrite Nat.mod_add; auto. rewrite Nat.mod_small; auto. apply Nat.lt_succ_diag_r. - apply Nat.mod_upper_bound; auto.
